ing: 1 teaspoon garlic and red chile paste, or more to taste
des: "Asian dipping sauce for spring rolls, lettuce wraps, or even use for Asian salad dressing."
ins: Stir water and sugar together in a bowl to dissolve the sugar; add soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, ketchup, lemon juice, garlic and red chile paste, and sesame oil into the water. Stir the mixture until smooth; refrigerate until ready to serve.
